resources.string: Select a small or a large piece:
Select small pieces to promote or large pieces to remove

pobo is a boop. / Gekitai² implementation for Android, written with Jetpack Compose.

The app is free, ad-free, and open source under the GNU GPL v3 License. The code is a modified fork of a Chess app (https://github.com/bentrengrove/chess) by Ben Trengrove, under MIT Licence.

Original illustrations used in pobo are from bcogwene (https://pixabay.com/users/bcogwene-1114581/) and are under CC0 Licence.

boop. and Gekitai² are games from Scott Brady. boop. is distributed by Smirk & Dagger Games.
